scene_description_enriched: The image depicts a male figure, likely Saint John the Baptist, standing in a natural setting with a backdrop of stylized trees and foliage. He has a golden halo, indicating his saintly status. He is dressed in a reddish-pink robe draped over a golden garment. In his left arm, he cradles a book upon which a white lamb rests. His right hand is raised, with the index finger pointing forward, a gesture often associated with preaching or identification. The lamb is a common symbol of Christ, the "Lamb of God."
